Semasa berkelah, Hakim telah memukul pengurus pusat perkelahan dan Yasmin kerana marah dengan mereka. Perhubungan Farish dengan Nasha semakin erat setelah Farish menghadiahkan bunga kepadanya.

programme.title: Azem 3
programme.desc: Bo (Nabil Ahmad) dan Peng (Johan As'ari) merupakan dua orang sahabat baik yang tinggal bersama dan bekerja di sebuah restoran makanan segera yang sama iaitu Opiel Secret Pizza. Peng yang terkenal dengan sikap peramah dan mesra setiap kali menjawab panggilan yang dari pelanggan untuk membuat pesanan pizza; manakala Bo terkenal dengan kepantasan dan kecekapannya menghantar pesanan pizza kepada pelanggan

programme.title: Rumah Angker Pondok Indah
programme.desc: Sebuah rumah, di mana telah berlaku pembunuhan keluarga, yang terdiri daripada seorang suami, isteri dan anak lelaki mereka. Sejak itu, rumah tersebut dikenali sebagai Rumah Berhantu Pondok Indah, kerana setiap penghuni baru yang menghuni rumah tersebut sentiasa digeruni oleh roh/hantu yang menghuni rumah tersebut. Beberapa tahun kemudian, sebuah keluarga baru menduduki rumah itu, jadi perkara yang sama berlaku lagi. Mereka digeruni oleh hantu rumah. Bolehkah mereka menyelamatkan diri daripada ketakutan hantu rumah atau dibunuh seorang demi seorang?

programme.title: Amukan Pocong S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Sementara itu, Dila dan 4 rakannya berkhemah di Sg. Tua. Dila dan rakan-rakan yang tidak tahu tentang kewujudan pocong Long Husin menjadi mangsa gangguan seterusnya selepas tengah malam. Malam itu adalah malam bonus buat Long Husin kerana Dila dan rakan sekhemahnya, Noy tidur bersama. Dila dan Noy menyangkakan rakan lelaki lain sengaja hendak menakutkan mereka tetapi ketia mereka nyenyak tidur, khemah mereka dibuka dan seorang demi seorang Dila dan Noy dibawa pergi. Esoknya, hanya mayat mereka sahaja yang ditemui tidak berapa jauh dari khemah mereka.

programme.title: Chikaro
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang gadis kampung naif yang datang ke bandar untuk mencari pekerjaan di sebuah pejabat dan di situ dia telah bertemu dengan bekas mat rempit yang telah jatuh cinta pada pandangan pertama. Dia berusaha untuk menolong gadis itu sesuaikan diri dengan gaya hidup bandar dan akhirnya gadis kampung itu juga telah jatuh cinta kepadanya. Walaubagaimanapun kerana sifatnya yang matang, ramai wanita mencemburuinya.

programme.title: Budak Magik Ep1
programme.desc: Memaparkan kisah Imran seorang pelajar yang kematian ibu dan obses dengan magik sering terlibat dalam pergaduhan kerana diganggu oleh pelajar-pelajar nakal di sekolah. Bapa Imran yang malu dengan teguran guru tentang pergaduhan Imran telah menghantar Imran tinggal bersama nenek dan bersekolah dikampung. Minatnya tentang magik telah membuat Imran sentiasa mencari kesempatan untuk mengasah bakat melakukan trik mengguna kad yang sentiasa dibawa kemana sahaja dia pergi. Imran juga dilihat asyik membaca sebuah buku bertajuk budak magik yang kebetulan dijumpai dibawah rumah neneknya.

programme.title: Seekers Underground Ep0102
programme.desc: Seekers kembali dengan nama baru Seekers Underground. Dengan teknologi baru serta tinjaun ke lokasi yang belum pernah diterokai

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki muda bersumpah untuk membalas dendam kepada seorang lelaki yang membutakan bapanya, hanya untuk terjebak dalam dunia jahat tinju bawah tanah dan menjalankan dadah.

programme.title: Maria Mariana 2
programme.desc: Maria dikejarkan ke hospital dan menemui cinta bersama doktor yang menyelamatkannya. Kemudiannya, dia ditugaskan untuk membanteras sindiket pengedaran dadah. Hubungan Maria dan Mariana kembali tegang apabila bekas kekasih Mariana muncul kembali. Cara hidup liar Mariana menyebabkan dia diperalatkan dan menimbulkan kekacauan dalam hidup mereka.

programme.title: Pemburu Bayang
programme.desc: Zamri merupakan seorang bekas banduan yang ingin memulakan hidup baru bersama keluarganya. Namun, nasib tidak menyebelahinya apabila dia diburu kumpulan yang diketuai Ramon. Adik Zamri, Awie ialah seorang penyanyi kumpulan rock popular yang sedang menjalinkan hubungan cinta bersama Ella, yang juga penyanyi rock. Sesuatu terjadi yang menyebabkan Awie dan Ella putus hubungan. Manakala, Zamri pula diuji dengan pelbagai dugaan apabila isterinya dibunuh dengan kejam.

programme.title: Bara
programme.desc: Effa berhijrah ke ibu kota untuk mencari rezeki yang halal diperangkap masuk ke sindiket pelacuran yang sekelip mata mengubah hidupnya. Amri, seorang mekanik menolong Effa untuk keluar dari sindiket itu namun tragedi berlaku apabila Effa dibunuh dan Amri dijadikan suspek kepada pembunuhan itu. Amri mula mencari jalan untuk membersihkan namanya.

programme.title: Maria Mariana
programme.desc: Dua beradik berbeza perwatakan - Maria, anak kebanggaan keluarga yang cemerlang dalam pelajaran - manakala Mariana, anak yang sering memberontak dan liar. Maria membesar menjadi seorang anggota polis namun Mariana masih sama seperti dahulu. Persengketaan terjadi apabila keduanya menyukai lelaki yang sama. Diculik geng, Maria sanggup menaruhkan nyawa demi menyelamatkan Mariana.

programme.title: Sembilu 2
programme.desc: Hubungan Awie dan Wati semakin baik dan mereka merancang untuk mengikat tali pertunangan. Sekali lagi menghadapi kesukaran apabila Ziana muncul untuk memecahbelahkan hubungan mereka berdua demi mendapatkan Awie. Menaruh hati kepada Wati, Syamsul ingin menjadikannya sebagai isteri. Konflik berlaku apabila Wati mula rasa ragu-ragu.

programme.title: Bayangan Maut
programme.desc: Anggota Unit Task Force Polis DiRaja Malaysia, antaranya ASP Razlan dan Inspektor Farah diberi tugas untuk menumpaskan sindiket pengedaran dadah dan penyeludupan senjata api antarabangsa. Razlan masih menunggu kata putus dari Farah atas lamarannya. Hubungan yang dibina semakin erat lalu mereka merancang untuk berkahwin - namun sebuah insiden berlaku sebelum perkahwinan mereka.

programme.title: Mr Cinderella 2
programme.desc: Hakimi kini menjadi CEO di syarikat Megapuri Bhd yang dimiliki oleh Puteri Megawati. Oleh sebab tidak dapat membiasakan diri dengan kehidupan barunya, Hakimi bertindak dengan meletakkan jawatan dan perkara ini merisaukan Puteri Megawati. Dalam masa yang sama, seorang wanita bernama Anisah jatuh hati kepada Hakimi. Dia menawarkan pekerjaan kepada Hakimi di syarikatnya dan pelbagai konflik berlaku di antara Hakimi, Puteri Megawati dan Anisah.

programme.title: Maria Mariana
programme.desc: Dua beradik berbeza perwatakan - Maria, anak kebanggaan keluarga yang cemerlang dalam pelajaran - manakala Mariana, anak yang sering memberontak dan liar. Maria membesar menjadi seorang anggota polis namun Mariana masih sama seperti dahulu. Persengketaan terjadi apabila keduanya menyukai lelaki yang sama. Diculik geng, Maria sanggup menaruhkan nyawa demi menyelamatkan Mariana.

programme.title: Bayangan Maut
programme.desc: Anggota Unit Task Force Polis DiRaja Malaysia, antaranya ASP Razlan dan Inspektor Farah diberi tugas untuk menumpaskan sindiket pengedaran dadah dan penyeludupan senjata api antarabangsa. Razlan masih menunggu kata putus dari Farah atas lamarannya. Hubungan yang dibina semakin erat lalu mereka merancang untuk berkahwin - namun sebuah insiden berlaku sebelum perkahwinan mereka.

programme.title: Sembilu
programme.desc: Perjalanan cinta seorang penyanyi rock terkenal dengan kekasihnya yang melalui pelbagai cabaran. Awie dan Wati telah bercinta sejak zaman persekolahan namun ditentang oleh abang Wati, Azman. Muncul pula Ziana, penyanyi baru yang sukakan Awie. Dia sanggup melakukan apa sahaja untuk memisahkan Awie dan Wati. Kesilapan Awie telah menyedarkan semula rasa cintanya kepada Wati.

programme.title: Maria Mariana 2
programme.desc: Maria dikejarkan ke hospital dan menemui cinta bersama doktor yang menyelamatkannya. Kemudiannya, dia ditugaskan untuk membanteras sindiket pengedaran dadah. Hubungan Maria dan Mariana kembali tegang apabila bekas kekasih Mariana muncul kembali. Cara hidup liar Mariana menyebabkan dia diperalatkan dan menimbulkan kekacauan dalam hidup mereka.

programme.title: Soal Hati
programme.desc: Daniel ialah seorang lelaki yang mempunyai segala-galanya. Dia jatuh cinta pandang pertama dengan Nurul Ain, seorang gadis kampung yang bekerja menjadi jurujual. Daniel berusaha untuk memikat Nurul Ain dengan berpura-pura menjadi seorang lelaki bernama Ahmad. Dalam masa yang sama bapa saudara Nurul Ain yang mempunyai masalah kewangan ingin menjodohkannya dengan seorang duda kaya.

programme.title: Iskandar
programme.desc: Karl Iskandar baru sahaja kembali ke tanah air untuk mengambil alih perniagaan ayahnya. Kepulangannya itu telah membongkar satu komplot pembunuhan seorang jutawan yang dirancang oleh Ringgo, seorang ketua gangster di Kuala Lumpur. Namun, di sebalik komplot pembunuhan tersebut Iskandar telah menemui satu kebenaran yang amat menyedihkan.

programme.title: Mr Cinderella
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Puteri Megawati, puteri mahkota negara Inderapuri yang mengalami kecederaan dalam satu kemalangan jalanraya telah diselamatkan oleh Hakimi. Semasa meninggalkan tempat kemalangan itu, Hakimi secara tidak sengaja tercicir sebelah kasut yang dipinjam daripada sahabatnya, Kumin. Oleh kerana berasa terhutang budi kepada penyelamatnya, Puteri Megawati meminta pertolongan seorang wartawan untuk mencari “Mr Cinderella” yang menyelamatkannya dengan ganjaran lumayan.

programme.title: Nafas Cinta
programme.desc: Amir berkelana ke Pulau Bayu untuk menenangkan fikirannya setelah kontrak muziknya dibatalkan. Di sana Amir terpesona dengan kemerduan suara Suria ketika membaca Al Quran. Setelah itu, hubungan Amir dan Suria menjadi semakin rapat. Suria tinggal bersama neneknya yang menghidap penyakit ketumbuhan. Amir membawa Suria dan neneknya ke bandar untuk mendapatkan rawatan serta ingin mengembangkan bakat Suria untuk menjadi seorang penyanyi.

programme.title: Pemburu Bayang
programme.desc: Zamri merupakan seorang bekas banduan yang ingin memulakan hidup baru bersama keluarganya. Namun, nasib tidak menyebelahinya apabila dia diburu kumpulan yang diketuai Ramon. Adik Zamri, Awie ialah seorang penyanyi kumpulan rock popular yang sedang menjalinkan hubungan cinta bersama Ella, yang juga penyanyi rock. Amri mula mencari jalan untuk membersihkan namanya.

programme.title: Sembilu 2
programme.desc: Hubungan Awie dan Wati semakin baik dan mereka merancang untuk mengikat tali pertunangan. Sekali lagi menghadapi kesukaran apabila Ziana muncul untuk memecahbelahkan hubungan mereka berdua demi mendapatkan Awie. Menaruh hati kepada Wati, Syamsul ingin menjadikannya sebagai isteri. Konflik berlaku apabila Wati mula rasa ragu-ragu.

programme.title: Pemburu Bayang
programme.desc: Zamri merupakan seorang bekas banduan yang ingin memulakan hidup baru bersama keluarganya. Namun, nasib tidak menyebelahinya apabila dia diburu kumpulan yang diketuai Ramon. Adik Zamri, Awie ialah seorang penyanyi kumpulan rock popular yang sedang menjalinkan hubungan cinta bersama Ella, yang juga penyanyi rock. Sesuatu terjadi yang menyebabkan Awie dan Ella putus hubungan. Manakala, Zamri pula diuji dengan pelbagai dugaan apabila isterinya dibunuh dengan kejam.

programme.title: Nafas Cinta
programme.desc: Amir berkelana ke Pulau Bayu untuk menenangkan fikirannya setelah kontrak muziknya dibatalkan. Di sana Amir terpesona dengan kemerduan suara Suria ketika membaca Al Quran. Setelah itu, hubungan Amir dan Suria menjadi semakin rapat. Suria tinggal bersama neneknya yang menghidap penyakit ketumbuhan. Amir membawa Suria dan neneknya ke bandar untuk mendapatkan rawatan serta ingin mengembangkan bakat Suria untuk menjadi seorang penyanyi.

programme.title: Bara
programme.desc: Effa berhijrah ke ibu kota untuk mencari rezeki yang halal diperangkap masuk ke sindiket pelacuran yang sekelip mata mengubah hidupnya. Amri, seorang mekanik menolong Effa untuk keluar dari sindiket itu namun tragedi berlaku apabila Effa dibunuh dan Amri dijadikan suspek kepada pembunuhan itu. Amri mula mencari jalan untuk membersihkan namanya.

programme.title: Bayangan Maut
programme.desc: Anggota Unit Task Force Polis DiRaja Malaysia, antaranya ASP Razlan dan Inspektor Farah diberi tugas untuk menumpaskan sindiket pengedaran dadah dan penyeludupan senjata api antarabangsa. Razlan masih menunggu kata putus dari Farah atas lamarannya. Hubungan yang dibina semakin erat lalu mereka merancang untuk berkahwin - namun sebuah insiden berlaku sebelum perkahwinan mereka.

programme.title: Maria Mariana
programme.desc: Dua beradik berbeza perwatakan - Maria, anak kebanggaan keluarga yang cemerlang dalam pelajaran - manakala Mariana, anak yang sering memberontak dan liar. Maria membesar menjadi seorang anggota polis namun Mariana masih sama seperti dahulu. Persengketaan terjadi apabila keduanya menyukai lelaki yang sama. Diculik geng, Maria sanggup menaruhkan nyawa demi menyelamatkan Mariana.

programme.title: Maria Mariana 2
programme.desc: Maria dikejarkan ke hospital dan menemui cinta bersama doktor yang menyelamatkannya. Kemudiannya, dia ditugaskan untuk membanteras sindiket pengedaran dadah. Hubungan Maria dan Mariana kembali tegang apabila bekas kekasih Mariana muncul kembali. Cara hidup liar Mariana menyebabkan dia diperalatkan dan menimbulkan kekacauan dalam hidup mereka.

programme.title: Sembilu
programme.desc: Perjalanan cinta seorang penyanyi rock terkenal dengan kekasihnya yang melalui pelbagai cabaran. Awie dan Wati telah bercinta sejak zaman persekolahan namun ditentang oleh abang Wati, Azman. Muncul pula Ziana, penyanyi baru yang sukakan Awie. Dia sanggup melakukan apa sahaja untuk memisahkan Awie dan Wati. Kesilapan Awie telah menyedarkan semula rasa cintanya kepada Wati.

programme.title: Sembilu 2
programme.desc: Hubungan Awie dan Wati semakin baik dan mereka merancang untuk mengikat tali pertunangan. Sekali lagi menghadapi kesukaran apabila Ziana muncul untuk memecahbelahkan hubungan mereka berdua demi mendapatkan Awie. Menaruh hati kepada Wati, Syamsul ingin menjadikannya sebagai isteri. Konflik berlaku apabila Wati mula rasa ragu-ragu.

programme.title: Mr Cinderella
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Puteri Megawati, puteri mahkota negara Inderapuri yang mengalami kecederaan dalam satu kemalangan jalanraya telah diselamatkan oleh Hakimi. Semasa meninggalkan tempat kemalangan itu, Hakimi secara tidak sengaja tercicir sebelah kasut yang dipinjam daripada sahabatnya, Kumin. Oleh kerana berasa terhutang budi kepada penyelamatnya, Puteri Megawati meminta pertolongan seorang wartawan untuk mencari “Mr Cinderella” yang menyelamatkannya dengan ganjaran lumayan.

programme.title: Mr Cinderella 2
programme.desc: Hakimi kini menjadi CEO di syarikat Megapuri Bhd yang dimiliki oleh Puteri Megawati. Oleh sebab tidak dapat membiasakan diri dengan kehidupan barunya, Hakimi bertindak dengan meletakkan jawatan dan perkara ini merisaukan Puteri Megawati. Dalam masa yang sama, seorang wanita bernama Anisah jatuh hati kepada Hakimi. Dia menawarkan pekerjaan kepada Hakimi di syarikatnya dan pelbagai konflik berlaku di antara Hakimi, Puteri Megawati dan Anisah.

programme.title: Iskandar
programme.desc: Karl Iskandar baru sahaja kembali ke tanah air untuk mengambil alih perniagaan ayahnya. Kepulangannya itu telah membongkar satu komplot pembunuhan seorang jutawan yang dirancang oleh Ringgo, seorang ketua gangster di Kuala Lumpur. Namun, di sebalik komplot pembunuhan tersebut Iskandar telah menemui satu kebenaran yang amat menyedihkan.

programme.title: Klu
programme.desc: Tuan Hudson yang kini dalam dilema apabila perniagaannya hampir bankrap, mengambil kesempatan ini dengan memujuk Bob supaya merapatkan diri dengan Maria. Tuan Hudson mahu mengerjakan harta Datuk Nordin sekiranya Bob berjaya dijodohkan dengan Maria.

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Gina dan Jo yang bertemu secara tak sengaja dan berpakat untuk memastikan Hardy dan Nita tak jadi berkahwin dengan bantuan dua lagi rakan mereka iaitu Lola dan Tompy.

programme.title: Bride For Rent
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki muda mengupah seorang wanita untuk menjadi pengantin perempuannya untuk menuntut warisannya, tetapi apabila tipu muslihat berterusan, perasaan timbul di antara mereka.

programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Minyak Dagu

programme.title: Kafir
programme.desc: Selepas kematian bapa mereka, dua beradik mesti mendedahkan punca keganasan paranormal yang mereka hadapi.

programme.title: The Cleaner

programme.title: Mat Kari Mek Tomyam
programme.desc: Wanda seorang gadis kampung yang datang ke Kuala Lumpur untuk bekerja di sebuah Café milik makciknya, telah bertemu dengan seorang jejaka yang gila dengan masakan Kari dan Wanda seorang yang hanya pandai memasak Tom Yam yang akhirnya menjadi satu cinta. Pelbagai dugaan dan telatah mereka berdua yang ditempuh semasa mengenali antara satu sama lain.

programme.title: Debu Debu Kasih
programme.desc: Suzana berumur 23 tahun, mengikut kawan-kawannya ke Terengganu, untuk menghilangkan rasa sunyi. di terengganu suzana bertemu Hassan, terbitlah rasa cinta. oleh kerana salahfaham berlakulah pertengkaran antara Hassan dan Suzana.

programme.title: Nana Tanjung
programme.desc: seorang duda, Nana yang sibuk membesarkan 3 orang anak dara beliau di Penang. Seorang jejaka bernama Akhbar Khan jatuh cinta dengan anak perempuan sulong Nana, Khairunisa, lalu sanggup menjadi pengawal peribadi beliau tetapi dia kemudian dapat tahu bahawa Nana mempunyai rancangan lain untuk perkahwinan Khairunisa.

programme.title: Dongeng Mistis
programme.desc: Filem omnibus ini mengisahkan enam kisah tentang keganasan enam hantu Indonesia: Ustaz yang diuji dengan keganasan pocong; Seorang wanita dikunjungi Bajang selepas menggugurkan kandungan, Tipu Sundel Bolong, Siasatan wartawan mengenai legenda misteri Begu Ganjang, Seorang wanita yang mendapati bapanya menjaga Genderuwo, dan seorang gadis yang melakukan tarian terlarang memanggil Lehak, makhluk terkutuk dari legenda.

programme.title: Mat Moto Otai
programme.desc: empat sahabat berusia pertengahan yang mempunyai minat yang sama iaitu terhadap motorsikal. Ia memaparkan tentang perjalanan mereka sebagai `mat moto otai`.

programme.desc: Tindakannya sebagai ustaz media sosial ini berjaya sehingga majikannya dan rakan-rakan pejabat yang mengikuti status paparannya percaya pada tahap ilmu keagamaannya . Hubungan cintanya dengan anak majikan juga mendapat sokongan . Namun kegembiraan itu hanyalah buat seketika bila salah seorang rakan pejabatnya berasa irihati dan membuat pelbagai fitnah terhadapnya

programme.title: The Trial

programme.title: Eva
programme.desc: Seorang wanita yang dari kecil mengimpikan mempunyai kuasa ajaib seperti di miliki sahabatnya . programme.title: Kurasakan Nikmat Allah Di Malam Lailatul Qadar
programme.desc: Kekufuran Naryo dalam menjalani kehidupannya, dia tidak pernah melaksanakan perintah Tuhan. Kehidupan Naryo berubah apabila dia muflis dan isterinya yang tidak setia, Ida, meninggalkannya.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep89
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Lucunya Tuh Disini Ramadhan Tuh Di Hati Ep12
programme.desc: Menyambut bulan Ramadhan, dengan para komedian dari Stand Up Comedy Academy dan para juri berkumpul di bawah satu pentas yang sama untuk menghiburkan kita semua. Dimeriahkan oleh Jraim Laode, Maria Vania, Jarwo Kwat, Mamat Alkatiri, Raditya Dika dan lain-lain.

programme.title: Sejadah Ep12
programme.desc: Sejadah (Sehat Jadi Ibadah) adalah program yang akan memberikan maklumat mengenai kesihatan dari perspektif perubatan dan aspek lain. Dihoskan oleh pakar kesihatan Dr Cahyono, Sp.Naturophaty dan Ustadz Solmed.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep41
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. programme.title: Toxic
programme.desc: Based on a true story, <Toxic> depicts the truth behind millions of mysterious death happened only in Spring.

programme.title: Christmas In August
programme.desc: A young man who owns a photo studio suffers from a fatal disease. He meets a policewoman and falls in love with her. What will be the fate of this love - will it be a tragic ending?

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Two Worlds
programme.desc: Having died unexpectedly, firefighter Ja-hong is taken to the afterlife by 3 guardians. To reincarnate, he must pass 7 trials in 49 days to prove that he led an upright life while he was still living.

programme.title: Always
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with a blind telemarketer and realizing her blindness was his fault, a former boxer decides to fight in an underground fighting contest to earn money for her surgery.

programme.title: Spellbound
programme.desc: Yeo-Ri has the ability to see ghosts. When she joins Jo-Goo's magic show, he offers to help her find a way out before the ghosts can chase him out of her life.

programme.title: The Himalayas
programme.desc: Based on true events, a renowned mountaineer sets out on a mission to Everest to retrieve his late junior climber's body and faces the greatest challenge of his life.

programme.title: Tazza: The Hidden Card
programme.desc: Go-ni's nephew, Ham Dae-gil, enters the gambling underworld only to be used as a scapegoat in a deal gone wrong. Now he's planning his revenge by entering one big fatal game.

programme.title: Deranged
programme.desc: A pharmaceutical salesman races against time to save his family when they start to exhibit symptoms of a fatal outbreak that had been causing an epidemic of drownings.

programme.title: Miracle: Letters To The President
programme.desc: A math prodigy who dreams of building a small railway station in his village works hard to win the presidential math competition and present his petition to the President in person.

programme.title: Feng Shui
programme.desc: A fengshui expert, Park Jae-Sang, who can determine the land that bring good fortune and people around him compete to occupy the land in order to change their fate and become king.

programme.title: Coffee Mate
programme.desc: A housewife meets a carpenter at a cafe. They become "coffee mates" where they have no other means of contact besides meeting at the cafe. Soon they find themselves developing feeling for each other.

programme.title: Da Capo
programme.desc: A frustrated songwriter met his old bandmate and a school band "Destroyer", who inspired him to complete an unfinished track...

programme.title: The Himalayas
programme.desc: Based on true events, a renowned mountaineer sets out on a mission to Everest to retrieve his late junior climber's body and faces the greatest challenge of his life.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: A man who became a suspect in a closed-door murder seeks help from an attorney to prove him innocent. As they begin to piece the puzzle together, the truth slowly reverses.

programme.title: 200 Pounds Beauty
programme.desc: A timid, overweight and under-appreciated back-up singer resorts to drastic "head-to-toe" plastic surgery to become a pop diva.

programme.title: Where The Truth Lies
programme.desc: Two Korean-American students are accused of murder but the investigation is thrown into confusion when the two suspects present contradicting accounts and evidence, and blame each other for the crime.

programme.title: Part-Time Spy
programme.desc: A former contract worker at the National Security Agency works with an undercover detective to recover money that was stolen from her boss in a voice phishing scheme.

programme.title: Inseparable Bros
programme.desc: Though not biologically related, two disabled men form a sibling-like relationship after spending 20 years together.

programme.title: The Divine Fury
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.

programme.title: Homme Fatale
programme.desc: A lovely young man becomes the first male gisaeng in Joseon to help his mother’s failing business. Until one day, a flower-like woman walks into his life and changes everything…

programme.title: A Werewolf Boy
programme.desc: A girl is sent to a country house for her health, where she befriends and attempts to civilize a feral boy she discovers on the grounds - but the beast inside him is constantly waiting to burst out.

programme.title: My Lovely Angel
programme.desc: A man bears the responsibility to take care of a deaf-blind girl unexpectedly, which turns out to be life-changing to both of them.

programme.title: Always
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with a blind telemarketer and realizing her blindness was his fault, a former boxer decides to fight in an underground fighting contest to earn money for her surgery.

programme.title: Little Forest
programme.desc: A young woman who gets tired of her difficult life in the city returns to her rural hometown. There, she meets her childhood friends and heals her emotional wounds.

programme.title: Miracle: Letters To The President
programme.desc: A math prodigy who dreams of building a small railway station in his village works hard to win the presidential math competition and present his petition to the President in person.

programme.title: The Front Line
programme.desc: Near the end of the Korean War, an uneasy ceasefire is ordered, but fighting continues on the front line of the Aerok Hills as soldiers battle to determine a new border between North and South Korea.

programme.title: You Are My Sunshine
programme.desc: The marital bliss of Seok-jung and Eun-ha was threatened as Eun-ha was tested positive for HIV and met her abusive ex-husband again...

programme.title: Coffee Mate
programme.desc: A housewife meets a carpenter at a cafe. They become "coffee mates" where they have no other means of contact besides meeting at the cafe. Soon they find themselves developing feeling for each other.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep10231024
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45884589
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-West Eyes to the East (M) (Repeat) Ep10
programme.desc: "iWalker - West Eyes to the East" followed the host, Rifat who is a foreigner that traveled abroad, leading the audience to experience Taiwan, which has never been seen before.

programme.title: A Beautiful Moment
programme.desc: An ageing bachelor finally meets the girl of his dreams and proposes marriage, only to discover her psychologist stepmom was his first love long ago. The future in-laws initially pretend not to know each other but as the wedding date gets nearer, the rekindling of long-dormant feelings develops into a cross-generational love triangle.

programme.title: Naked Soldier
programme.desc: When Interpol agent Long busted a billion-dollar drug deal 15 years ago, the cartel took revenge and killed his family. The cartel boss, Madame Rose, even kidnaps and raises Long’s daughter, Phoenix, to become a skilled assassin. Only when Phoenix is about to kill Long did she discover the startling fact about her true identity…

programme.title: Concerto of the Bully
programme.desc: The story follows an internet songwriter Jamie, who is gifted with an extraordinary retentive memory. One day, she was kidnapped by Yung, a street punk, to a remote fish raft. In the hope to flee with the only ability she has, Jamie offers to give Yung a spiritual music therapy. The two who have nothing in common begin to form a bond through music.

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his family’s massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Nightfall
programme.desc: Detective George Lam investigates the brutal death of a Sino-British conductor and suspects he is murdered by Wong Yuen Yeung, a dumb killer who has just been released from prison. When out on a manhunt for Wong, Lam finds more revelations to the contrary and has to pursue every possibility, taking him deep into Wong’s past.

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kong’s Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: Rise of the Legend
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung is a fearless fighter who aligns himself with one of the two gang leaders ruling Guangzhou. However, there is more to the young Wong Fei Hung than meets the eye as he has a more dangerous agenda in mind.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Alex Fong and Cecilia So star as two lost souls in this romantic comedy. One has constantly been physically abused and cheated on by his girlfriend, the other was a former beer girl turned into a wandering spirit following a car accident. As the two begin to spend time together, love begins to repair their broken hearts.

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his family’s expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his family’s reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: Love is…Pyjamas
programme.desc: Underwear designer Spring and her daughter work at Hugo’s enterprise. Hugo demands a new fashion line design competition between Spring and the newly employed ex model Jojo to save his company from bankruptcy and the winner will take charge of the line. Who will win the competition and will Hugo’s enterprise be saved?

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: Miracles of The Namiya General Store, The
programme.desc: From Japan's best-selling author, Keigo Higashino, comes a heartwarming fantasy of an everyday general store that becomes a portal through time. When three delinquents accidentally enter the premise, they trigger a series of events that allow a letter from the past, seeking advice, to mysteriously slips through the mail slot.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score…

programme.title: My Country, My Parents
programme.desc: Set in 4 different eras in China, the 4-part anthology about ‘home and country’ is directed by Wu Jing, Zhang Zi Yi, Xu Zheng and Shen Teng, who also star in their own story. The movie depicts how the ‘fathers’ forge ahead through the struggle of times, defending strong family ties and passing on the ‘fighting’ spirit through generations.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say “yes”?

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Henry Chen, a former soldier, is recruited for his toughest mission yet - teaching a class of teen delinquents. As he kicks his way into their school and home lives, it becomes clear that his unconventional teaching style might be just what they need.

programme.title: Shoplifters
programme.desc: A Japanese family with lowly paid part-time jobs turns to shoplifting to make ends meet. After one shoplifting session, the father Osamu and his son come across a little girl in the cold. Osamu’s wife agrees to take her in after learning her hardships, and they seem to live happily together until an unforeseen incident reveals hidden secrets..

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find “the-one”?

programme.title: One Second
programme.desc: Directed by renowned director Zhang Yimou, the film is set during the Cultural Revolution, where a common man escapes a labour camp to find a newsreel that captures his daughter for one second in a movie. On the way, he encounters an orphan who also seeks the movie reel. Can the man finally pass the reel to a projectionist and screen the movie?

programme.title: Firestorm
programme.desc: Lu Ming Zhe is a senior police inspector who has repeatedly solved major cases in Hong Kong. When confronting the head of the gangster in the street one day, Lu was distracted and sabotaged by his childhood friend who has just been released from prison. Facing continuous provocation by criminal gangs, Lu vows to eliminate them at all costs.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: Tears of No Regret
programme.desc: Monkey King is bewitched and harmed by an evil spirit, who is none other than goddess Lucky Star in its previous life, whom Monkey King knows 300 years ago. He decides to travel back in time to find out what happened…

programme.title: Think Big Big
programme.desc: Moon is a plus-sized girl working happily as a mascot at a theme park. That is until one day she accidentally joins a weight loss competition, with her remarkable transformation turning her into the "Nation’s Goddess". Netizens have their eyes glued on her, turning her life upside down, and Moon has to find a way to be happy again.

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the other’s mole.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: Crazy Nuts Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: A roadside bandit and a traveling gambler team up to make money from gambling. In a successful attempt to steal a huge amount of money from a warlord’s home, they encounter revolutionists who seek their help to fund the reform campaign. Will the two help the revolutionists’ cause with the stolen money?

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her father’s towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Celebrated scriptwriter Shen Chiang (Heroes of Sung) continues to spread his magic touch to directing with this tale surrounding the end of the Song dynasty. Threatened by the Yuan who are closing in to rule the whole of China, a band of Song survivors band together to save their prime minister. This bold and fearless heroes fighting for their cause are led by international star, Lo Lieh (Glass Tears, Killer Clans) and Shi Szu ( Lovers Destiny), who must fight their way out of trap after trap. But they can't escape them all, and eventually the two end up in prison... it is either death or a fight to the end!

programme.title: Lover's Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a man’s role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Heroes Two
programme.desc: Shaolin disciple Hung escapes from the burning temple after it is attacked by the Qing army and is badly wounded. He is handed over to the Qing soldiers by Fang as he mistakes Hung for a bandit. When Fang realizes his mistakes, he tries all ways to help Hung escape so that they can team up to fight the Qing army together.

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: Flying Guillotine 2
programme.desc: In a time of anti-Manchu sentiment, Emperor Yong Zheng employs his ruthless Blood Hound Corps to silence any dissenters. Only one man and his signature weapon, The Flying Guillotine, stand in their way.

programme.title: The House of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: The Fastest Sword
programme.desc: Southern Swordsman Ting is named “The Fastest Sword” but is defeated by a street monk and has to fulfil his promise of working on stone craving with the monk for three years. Ting returns home to lead a peaceful life after that and declines all fight challenges. Even so, he is forced to fight the Northern Swordsman. Who will win finally?

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This tale of a honorable fighter's retraining in the "Iron Palm" style, that became the first international martial arts movie hit and made a continent-spanning star of Lo Lieh.

programme.title: That Man In Chang-an
programme.desc: The Han Emperor dies and his Empress Lu seizes the ruling power. She plots to kill the heir to the throne, Liu Heng, but the masked warrior discovers her plot and tips off Liu. Liu sends his princess to Chang An to ask for help. The masked warrior protects the princess from attackers along the way and supports Liu to become the new Emperor.

programme.title: The Wandering Swordsman
programme.desc: The wandering swordsman Yu Hsieh Erh has formidable sword skills and helps the poor by robbing from thieves and distributing the wealth. He meets a group of bandits who are planning to rob a convoy escorting some valuables and is tricked into participating in the robbery. Yu soon realizes his folly and returns to take revenge on the bandits.

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Lady With A Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman Feng tries to find a group of villains responsible for her eldest sister's death, but is shocked to discover that her fiancé, Jin, is one of them. At the same time, Jin's mother and the two other killers are planning to kill Feng. Can Feng fight back and take her revenge?

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: After killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk, Wu Song is appointed as chief constable. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang seduces Wu Song but gets rejected and later engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang after he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brother’s death, Wu Song kills the two of them.

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: Governor Yan is killed and his guard Fan identifies Kou as the assassin by his signature weapon, a dart. Kou is listed as a wanted man when he enters the city, but managed to escape arrest with the help of the innkeeper’s daughter. At the same time, Fan is attacked by a bandit who pretends to be Kou. What are the secret plots behind these attacks?

programme.title: A Place to Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed “The Invincible Fist” is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: When the Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his son’s arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperor’s plot once again.

programme.title: Raw Passions
programme.desc: Mrs Lin's husband and his friend both have affairs with a belly dancer Sasa, and are both blackmailed by her. Sasa is stabbed one day and her brother shows up asking for money. A mysterious man also claims he can offer evidence for cash to help Lin’s husband. Lin has to unveil the deceit, double-crosses and blackmailing before she is in danger too!

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Hsu Lo is up against an evil black magic practitioner San Kan Mi, who wants to place a death spell on him and a love spell on his fiancée Wang Chu Ying. Fortunately, Wang's friends manage to find another veteran witch doctor to take on the evil San. This bone-chilling tale of good versus evil races to a heart-stopping ending.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Chang’s. On the Chang’s farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Apartment for Ladies
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer comes to Hong Kong in search for her missing younger sister, who had arrived in Hong Kong to be discovered as a nightclub singer. She finds lodging at an apartment for women run by a man-hating landlady, Mrs Chan. However, Mrs Chan cannot confine the young ladies’ youthful vitality within the apartment.

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a police’s son, blames his father for his mother’s death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A seasoned burglar 'The Lizard' sets himself up against a corrupt police chief and announced that he will steal a diamond from a rich man’s party. His real identity, which is discovered by the corrupt police chief’s granddaughter, is actually a young policeman who is doing it all for justice.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Hui’s husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: The Singing Thief
programme.desc: A master jewel thief turns over a new leaf as a professional singer in a nightclub. However, a series of robberies happened shortly after and he becomes the suspect again. The thief then sets up a trap to snare the copycat but will this backfire on him?

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fang’s fiancé and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him…

programme.title: Magnificent Wanderers
programme.desc: Lin and his two friends are traveling patriots who vow to stand up against violence and fight for justice. They meet a rich young man Chu by chance one day and the four become best friends. When a foreign prince plots to possess Chu’s family fortune and goes after him, Lin and friends go all out to help Chu fight against the villain.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriend’s baby...

programme.title: Podhuvaga En Manasu Thangam
programme.desc: Tamil Thriller Romantic Movie, Starring, Udhayanidhi Stalin, Nivetha Pethuraj, Parthiepan, Soori, Mayilsamy,Rajendran & Others

programme.desc: Tamil horror thriller film, Starring, Trisha Krishnan, Jackky Bhagnani, Yogi Babu, Ganeshkar, Jangiri Madhumitha & Others

programme.title: Vellivizha Nayagan
programme.desc: Tarzan, a stunt artist, falls in love with actress Gowri. Soon, it turns out to become a love triangle when famous actor Premanand, who is attracted to Gowri, sets off on a mission to kill Tarzan.

programme.title: Stalin
programme.desc: Stalin is deeply moved by the suicide of a girl with physical disabilities. As a result, he devises a formula of extending unconditional help to those who need it to establish peace.

programme.title: Zakhmi Cheetah
programme.desc: After he is killed, ACP Bose is falsely accused of siphoning off money from a bank that he is investigating. Enraged by the events that led to Bose's death, his younger brother, Velu, seeks revenge.

programme.title: Dus
programme.desc: Jamwaal, a terrorist, plans to wreak havoc in Canada when the Indian Prime Minister visits the nation. However, a team of special agents from India are sent to catch the terrorist.

programme.title: Asoka
programme.desc: Asoka, the heir to the Maurya Empire, is sent on an exile for having fought with his half-brother, Susima. While travelling south, he meets Kaurwaki, princess of Kalinga, and falls for her.

programme.title: ...Aur Pyaar Ho Gaya
programme.desc: Ashi travels to Switzerland to meet the suitor she is supposed to marry. However, in a case of mistaken identity, she meets another man and soon begins to fall for him.

programme.title: ACP Shiva
programme.desc: Shivakumar, a dishonest cop, ensures that he is transferred to Chennai, where he exploits his position for financial gain. He also supports GK, a local MP, against the commissioner of Chennai.

programme.title: ACP Shiva
programme.desc: Shivakumar, a dishonest cop, ensures that he is transferred to Chennai, where he exploits his position for financial gain. He also supports GK, a local MP, against the commissioner of Chennai.

programme.title: Main Hoon Na
programme.desc: Major Ram is given orders to go undercover as a college student to protect a general's daughter from a rogue soldier. He even has to fulfil his dying father's desire to reconcile with his family.

programme.title: De Dana Dan
programme.desc: Two penniless friends are in desperate need of money in order to marry their respective girlfriends. In their attempts to make quick money, they kidnap a rich woman's pet and demand a hefty ransom.

programme.title: Super Hero Shehanshah
programme.desc: An ordinary milkman moves to Chennai and endeavours to put an end to crime. A journalist who finds the truth about him convinces him to become a superhero who fights for the people.

programme.title: Department
programme.desc: Inspector Mahadev Bhosale recruits Shiv Narayan, a suspended brave police officer, to form a hit squad. Soon after Shiv joins the gangster-turned-minister Sarjerao Gaikwad, Mahadev and Shiv turn foes.

programme.title: Romeo. Akbar. Walter.
programme.desc: A bank cashier, Romeo, is recruited by India's intelligence agency for espionage in Pakistan. However, he finds himself in challenging situations when his cover gets blown.

programme.title: Yeh Lamhe Judaai Ke
programme.desc: Dushant, an aspiring singer, is encouraged by Jaya to achieve his dreams. However, after Dushant becomes successful, his other friends try to create misunderstandings between him and Jaya.

programme.title: Chaahat
programme.desc: When Roop comes to the city for his father's medical treatment, he falls for Pooja and proposes to her. However, when a spoilt Reshma falls for him, she turns crazy and tries to own him.

programme.title: Gollu Aur Pappu
programme.desc: Two brothers, Gollu and Pappu, confront Gustaad Khan, a terrorist, for blowing up their garage. However, he decides to take advantage of their innocence by making them deploy a bomb in Ludhiana.

programme.title: Gollu Aur Pappu
programme.desc: Two brothers, Gollu and Pappu, confront Gustaad Khan, a terrorist, for blowing up their garage. However, he decides to take advantage of their innocence by making them deploy a bomb in Ludhiana.

programme.title: Deewane Huye Paagal
programme.desc: After witnessing a murder committed by a gangster, Tanya flees to Dubai. Karan, who loves her, goes after her only to realise that she is pursued by a few more suitors and the gangster himself.

programme.title: Abhimanyu
programme.desc: Abhimanyu, a professional computer engineer, puts his life at risk and fights for people from poverty-stricken areas so that they receive an education.

programme.title: U Me Aur Hum
programme.desc: While on a cruise, Dr Ajay Mehra falls in love with Piya and soon marries her. They lead a harmonious life until Piya gets pregnant and is soon diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease.

programme.title: Sangdil Sanam
programme.desc: Kishan and Sanam are engaged as children but are separated when his father is accused of a robbery. Later, a grown-up Kishan sets out to claim Sanam as his bride unaware that she is a changed person.

programme.title: Ek Aur Bol Bachchan

programme.title: This Teacher

programme.title: Blackbird

programme.title: Her Job
programme.desc: In this slow-burning film about sexism and female emancipation, Panayiota is an illiterate housewife who gets her first job as a cleaner. Over time, she rises up the ranks and gains her family respect; but danger looms as a series of layoffs start.

programme.title: Burning Birds
programme.desc: After her husband is murdered by a local militia, Kusum has to support her eight children and her mother-in-law. With the breadwinner gone, Kusum has to make extreme choices in the face of her desperation.

programme.title: The Blind Detective: The Lost Souls Of Vienna

programme.title: One Floor Below
programme.desc: After being the sole unfortunate witness to a domestic quarrel that ends up in a murder, Patrascu finds himself at odds with two very close neighbours: one is the bizarre murderer. The other is his very own conscience.

programme.desc: Fish fingers are covered with batter and bread crumbs; puffed corn meal is coated with caramel; creating crinkle-cut sweet potato fries; and cookie dough batter is frozen, then smothered in chocolate.

programme.title: The Hunt (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: In the Grip of the Seasons - The only option for the Arctic's top predators, the wolf, the Arctic fox and the polar bear, is to continually adapt to their changing world, exploiting the good times and enduring the bad.

programme.title: Search for the Last Unicorn
programme.desc: With exclusive access, the BBC follows an international team of experts on an expedition to a war zone to go in search of the Northern White Rhinoceros. An animal that little is really known about.

programme.title: Food Factory (S3) Ep17
programme.desc: A look at production in food factories including hamburger patties, ribbon candy, and Mexican chocolate discs.

programme.title: Food Factory (S3) Ep18
programme.desc: A look at how some foods are made in food factories including root beer, mini chocolate cakes and tamari soy sauce.

programme.title: Equator From The Air (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Pacific - Crossing the Pacific, Gordon discovers how a view from above is helping protect hammerhead sharks and giant tortoises, and what it could reveal about the future of our coral reefs.

programme.title: Kate Humble's Coastal Britain (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Suffolk - Starting at Dunwich Heath, Kate walks an 11-mile stretch of the Suffolk coastline - one of the fastest eroding in Europe. Kate also learns about the ancient art of thatching.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: An old and deserted dry dock is transformed into an amazing subterranean museum, after the engineers drain the entire ground and build a new concrete base.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green (S2) Ep2
programme.desc: Alaska - Robson heads north to Alaska for extreme temperatures and extreme fish, including northern pike, king salmon, cod, chinook salmon and rainbow trout.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Under Pressure - As food and water become scarce, Crystal, the fierce leader of the Ruins gang, sets her sights on rival Kati’s territory and its neighboring fruit trees. Watch as Crystal’s move and a raid by outside invaders lead to dire consequences for one troop.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dora the Baby Muriqui - Feel the enchantment of Brazil’s Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep7
programme.desc: The Road to Recovery - Beni and Lala get an unexpected visit from Vet Arga, Kesi makes a new friend on Bangamat Island, and Alejandra deals with a new view of the world after the accident at forest school leaves her blind in one eye.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Romeo and Julieta - This is the story of Julieta, a female golden dart frog, in search of her Romeo. She’s about to lay her eggs and must find a male to fertilize them. Romeo’s calls guide her through the forest, but crossing the dense rainforest is no easy feat.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Indonesia: Islands of Fire - With approximately 130 active volcanoes, Indonesia is arguably the most active place on earth. Volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer leads an expedition to some of Indonesia's most remote and rarely visited volcanoes.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep6
programme.desc: City - It’s Halifax through the eyes of its wildest residents. During the day, squirrels and chipmunks compete for territory in the city park. At night, Halifax’s raccoons invade backyards and seagulls scour the streets for pizza.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Mexico's Artificial Reefs - From opportunistic pirate ships, to well-armed navy vessels, Mexico’s Yucatan Peninsula is steeped in maritime history.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Elephant Rescue - When a trio of Elephants are orphaned in Zambia, they are rescued and trasported to a purpose-build nursery. But it won't be smooth-sailing for the young Pachyderms; life lessons will be tough to imprint before they are returned to the wild.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Battle Lines - As the dry season approaches, tensions rise on Lemur Island, both between rival gangs and within their own ranks. Get a view from the battlefield as the female leaders fiercely defend their turf, while their newborn infants cling to them for safety.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Under Pressure - As food and water become scarce, Crystal, the fierce leader of the Ruins gang, sets her sights on rival Kati’s territory and its neighboring fruit trees. Watch as Crystal’s move and a raid by outside invaders lead to dire consequences for one troop.

programme.desc: Mexico's Artificial Reefs - From opportunistic pirate ships, to well-armed navy vessels, Mexico’s Yucatan Peninsula is steeped in maritime history.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Highlands - Cape Breton Highlands National Park was established to protect the primeval forest from clear-cutting – but today the park faces a new threat. Moose, beavers and moths have combined to decimate large sections of the Boreal and Acadian woodlands

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Battle Lines - As the dry season approaches, tensions rise on Lemur Island, both between rival gangs and within their own ranks. Get a view from the battlefield as the female leaders fiercely defend their turf, while their newborn infants cling to them for safety.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep2

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Romeo and Julieta - This is the story of Julieta, a female golden dart frog, in search of her Romeo. She’s about to lay her eggs and must find a male to fertilize them. Romeo’s calls guide her through the forest, but crossing the dense rainforest is no easy feat.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Indonesia: Islands of Fire - With approximately 130 active volcanoes, Indonesia is arguably the most active place on earth. Volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer leads an expedition to some of Indonesia's most remote and rarely visited volcanoes.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Wetlands - Wild Wild East’s wetland habitats are at risk. These marshes and bogs are the ancient home of the endangered Blanding’s Turtle. But each fall new turtles spring from the lake shores of Nova Scotia. If the vulnerable Blanding’s can make it through their first few years of life, they'll live for almost a century. But saving the turtle means protecting the wetlands, and all the other amphibians and reptiles that call the slow-moving waters home.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep9
programme.desc: Crustaceans - The relationships between species like lobsters, scallops and crabs are numerous and complicated. Changing water temperature is bringing invasive species to the Wild Wild East, putting pressure on the species humans count on for important commercial harvests.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Mob Rules - The Eastern Grey kangaroo is a sociable species, clustering together in small groups known as mobs. A mob is a social network focused on feeding, where members will come and go as they please, depending on the availability of food.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Camp Phoenix Herd - Camp Phoenix in Zambia’s Kafue National Park is elephant heaven. Here a herd of orphan elephants are being given another chance. Their human carers teach them the skills they’ll need to join an elephant herd in the wild.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Thiago the Coati Kitten - Set a course for adventure with Thiago, a brave baby coati. Find out how this raccoon-like fellow sharpens his sniffing and foraging skills, crosses suburban roads near his lush Brazilian forest home, and avoids inanimate and four-legged dangers.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep8
programme.desc: Outbreak! - The race is on to find Tulia and Zalipa, who are missing from Palas Island. And after months of convalescence, Beni returns to forest school but faces another setback at the milk bucket. Meanwhile, the vets keep a close eye on pregnant Dilla.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Romeo and Julieta - This is the story of Julieta, a female golden dart frog, in search of her Romeo. She’s about to lay her eggs and must find a male to fertilize them. Romeo’s calls guide her through the forest, but crossing the dense rainforest is no easy feat.

programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Sweet Seduction - Discover the story of the much loved Sausage Tree, whose nectar filled blooms and sausage shaped fruits entice animals of all kinds, from insects to elephants. See how the very animals who rely on this generous tree ensure its proliferation.

programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Giant - In a misty South African forest grows a six hundred year old Outeniqua Yellowwood. At forty meters tall, she towers above the canopy and is one of the few remaining of her kind. Follow her captivating story, unique as the ecosystem in her branches.

programme.desc: The Giant - In a misty South African forest grows a six hundred year old Outeniqua Yellowwood. At forty meters tall, she towers above the canopy and is one of the few remaining of her kind. Follow her captivating story, unique as the ecosystem in her branches.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep10
programme.desc: Horses of St. Pierre & Miquelon - In the Northern Atlantic, cold Canadian waters surround eight European Islands. This is the last remaining overseas territory of France, and the summer-home to a semi-feral population of horses and ponies. Wild Wild East infiltrates the herd to explore the politics and power of horses. Meanwhile, in the waters surrounding the French archipelago, the once-vast stocks of cod fish are disappearing, changing life above the surface for humans and horses.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep11
programme.desc: Invasion - Non-native species have made their way into the Wild Wild East and staked their claim to the jagged coast. At White Point Beach Resort in Liverpool, Nova Scotia bunnies have hopped on in for an extended holiday. It’s turf wars between the beachcombers and the chalets dwellers. Meanwhile, the starling population is beginning to rival gulls and pigeons.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo 1 Ep2
programme.desc: From Pouch to Foot - Eastern Grey kangaroos are prolific breeders, but bringing up baby is fraught with challenges. Predators, climate extremes, and lively joeys mean kangaroo mothers face a daily struggle to keep their young alive.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Predators Uncovered - In the heart of the Zambian bush is a unique and special place. A beautiful Valley, bursting with life. It is home to a rich and diverse array of wildlife and is one of the last remaining strongholds for some of Africa's most endangered large carnivores.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Young Ones - In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 2 Ep9
programme.desc: Dilla and Delilah - The fate of several graduates awaits the next round of wild releases. Meanwhile, runaway Zalipa is found, but her partner in crime, Tulia, is still missing. And Baby Clarita has a complete meltdown as the vets perform surgery on her mother.

programme.title: Rooted 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Sweet Seduction - Discover the story of the much loved Sausage Tree, whose nectar filled blooms and sausage shaped fruits entice animals of all kinds, from insects to elephants. See how the very animals who rely on this generous tree ensure its proliferation.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Partners - Meet a golden retriever that assuages anxiety and helps heal PTSD, a shepherd mix who rescues mudslide survivors, a pair of spaniels who sniff out underground water leaks, and a group of teacher’s pets in the UK that assist children learning to read.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Protectors - A blind woman has found a new lease on life thanks to her canine running mate, a Jack Russell works as a super-nanny to a surprising array of species, and a team of dogs in Kenya are on daily patrol protecting endangered rhinos from poachers.

programme.title: Donal's Irish Adventure (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: Donal and Max go back home to the fair city of Dublin. A city steeped in tradition, innovation, culture, craic and culinary delights.

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect (S3) Ep6
programme.desc: Victoria and Raheel - Two architects compete using virtual reality to remodel a 1990s build in Milton Keynes. Will the finished design fulfill the dreams of the family of six who live there?

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House New Home (S7) Ep4
programme.desc: Clapham and Hove - In Clapham, Masum and Maria's Victorian terraced home no longer works for their family. In Hove, Louis and Sarah tackle the upstairs of their 16th-century gatehouse.

programme.title: The World's Most Secret Hotels (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Extreme Escapes - In Cambodia we venture to the banks of the Timor Rung River to the Shinta Mani Wild Hotel. A series of 15 tents deep in the wilderness and accessible only after a 3 hour drive from Phnom Penh, access is via a 400 metre zip wire.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Together (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Celebration Meal - Jamie makes an incredible celebration meal of rainbow tomato crostini and an epic slow-roasted lamb shoulder, finished off with strawberry panna cottas and mango caipirinhas.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals (S14) Ep8
programme.desc: This quarter-final sees the strongest four chefs from heats three and four prepare a dish based around mustard. Then they must cook for critics Grace Dent, Tom Parker Bowles and William Sitwell.

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect (S3) Ep6
programme.desc: Victoria and Raheel - Two architects compete using virtual reality to remodel a 1990s build in Milton Keynes. Will the finished design fulfill the dreams of the family of six who live there?

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Together (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Celebration Meal - Jamie makes an incredible celebration meal of rainbow tomato crostini and an epic slow-roasted lamb shoulder, finished off with strawberry panna cottas and mango caipirinhas.

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House New Home (S7) Ep5
programme.desc: Lighthorne - George takes on a 17th-century cottage in Lighthorne, Warwickshire. Builder Anthony and physiotherapist Emily are determined to turn this ramshackle build into their family home.

programme.title: Nadiya's Food Adventure (S1) Ep6
programme.desc: Scotland - In Scotland, Nadiya is shown by a local forager how wild herbs have all the flavour and spice to create a Scottish curry, and mills her own flour.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Secret France (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Rick Stein's journey of discovery brings him to the sunnier climes of the Mediterranean, where he explores the French-Catalan legacy of Roussilon on the foothills of the Pyrenees.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals (S14) Ep9
programme.desc: In heat five, the Skills Tests involve poussin cooked and served on the bone, and chickpea panisses with an aubergine dip.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals (S14) Ep10
programme.desc: Heat five continues as the four chefs try to impress the judges with their Signature Dishes. The two who deliver the best dishes will go through to the quarter-finals.

programme.title: Grand Designs (S20) Ep5
programme.desc: In Derbyshire, Mike and Sarah set out to build a multigenerational longhouse. But with a complicated roof, a shortage of materials and an unexpected bereavement, it proves far from easy...

programme.title: Ghosts Of Morgan City S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Blue Shirt Of Idlewild - The team investigates a limbless phantom at a historic plantation in Patterson, LA.

programme.title: Mummies Unwrapped S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Hunting The Mummy Of Lincoln's Assassin - A missing mummy could rewrite the history of Abraham Lincoln's assassination.Ramy Romany investigates a potential government cover-up.

programme.title: Mysteries At The Museum S13 Ep11
programme.desc: Riding Thunder, Warm Springs And Catcher Spy - Don Wildman investigates a F8 Crusader jet, FDR's convertible and a token linked to a spy.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Episode 5 - In Madrid's main airport, Madrid-Barajas,5,000 security cameras help agents maintain security. Follow state security forces to discovery how they monitor Spain's borders.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Episode 6 - In Madrid's main airport, Madrid-Barajas,5,000 security cameras help agents maintain security. Follow state security forces to discovery how they monitor Spain's borders.

programme.title: Bahamas Life S5 Ep3
programme.desc: Newfound Freedom - A woman fell in love with the rustic beauty of Eleuthera. After recently becoming single, she’s ready to start her next chapter with a home in the Bahamas.

programme.title: Bahamas Life S5 Ep4
programme.desc: Up From Down Under - A woman decides to escape her high-pressure job and looks for a retreat on the island of Eleuthera. It has stunning beaches, but can she find her dream home?

programme.title: Beyond The Unknown S3 Ep15
programme.desc: Apollo 10 Mystery Petrified Giant And Alien Airpla - Don Wildman investigates a cosmic cacophony on the dark side of the moon, recalls how the world's greatest showman pulled off a gigantic hoax.

programme.title: Ghost Brothers: Haunted Houseguests S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Demon Problems - A malevolent entity is tormenting a woman and her grandson.

programme.title: Mummies Unwrapped S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Chasing The Mummy Of Moses - Ramy Romany tracks down the 3,000-year-old clues that suggest Moses, the prophet of Judaism, Christianity and Islam.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Episode 7 - In Madrid's main airport, Madrid-Barajas,5,000 security cameras help agents maintain security. Follow state security forces to discovery how they monitor Spain's borders.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Episode 8 - In Madrid's main airport, Madrid-Barajas,5,000 security cameras help agents maintain security. Follow state security forces to discovery how they monitor Spain's borders.

programme.title: Bahamas Life S5 Ep5
programme.desc: Turning A Picture Into Reality - A couple from Pennsylvania are ready to make a beach house dream a reality. After years of working hard, they now want to be more adventurous!

programme.title: Bahamas Life S5 Ep6
programme.desc: Dreams Do Come True - A couple from North Carolina looks for a holiday home on Long Island. There is no shortage of lovely beachfront properties, but will they find the right home?

programme.title: Ghost Brothers: Haunted Houseguests S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Haunted By History - The owner of a bed and breakfast fears paranormal activity on the property may be having a negative impact on her family and guests.
